Errors.attributes: Are you sure you want to convert all unspent attribute points into Karma?
Errors.maxLanguagesToRead: You can read/write at most as many languages as your Read/Write skill rank
Errors.maxLanguagesToSpeak: You can speak at most as many languages as your Speak Language skill rank
Errors.noClass: You must choose a Discipline or Questor to continue.
Errors.noMoreAttributeChange: You cannot increase this attribute further. A maximum of -2 points may be reduced and +8 points may be added.
Errors.noMoreSkillRanks: No more skill ranks available. The maximum is 3.
Errors.noMoreSpellPoints: You cannot choose more spells. Your Perception step determines the number of spells (the Circle equals the cost).
Errors.noNamegiver: You must select a Namegiver to continue.
Errors.notFinished: You cannot complete character creation yet, there are still steps remaining.
Errors.skillRanksLeft: You must assign all skill ranks to continue.
Errors.talentRanksLeft: You must assign all talent ranks to continue.

CharGen.charGenRules:
Character creation follows the rules in the Player's Guide.
The following steps must be completed in order:
  • Select a Namegiver (this tab)
  • Select a Discipline (or Questor) and assign its abilities.
  • Assign attributes.
  • Select spells (if the Discipline is spellcasting).
  • Choose your skills.
  • Choose your languages.
  • Choose your equipment.
CharGen.chooseAttributesRules:
Distribute free attribute points among the six attributes. Unspent points are converted to Karma at 1:1.
The Preview shows value changes for each attribute increase or decrease.
CharGen.chooseClassRules: Select a Discipline or switch to Questors to become one.
CharGen.chooseDevotionRules:
Choose an optional Devotion and raise it to Rank 1.
The Questor Devotion is added at Rank 1 automatically.
CharGen.chooseEquipmentRules:
Each character starts with 100 silver and the following standard gear:
  • Adventurer's Kit (backpack, bedroll, flint & steel, torch, waterskin, large sack)
  • Artisan Tool (matching the character's Artisan skill; requires GM approval)
  • Dagger or Knife (or a similar size 1 or 2 weapon)
  • Grimoire (only for spellcasters)
  • Travel Clothing (boots, belt, shirt, robe or pants, cloak)
  • Rations (1 week)
CharGen.chooseLanguagesRules:
Select the languages the character can speak and read/write.
Maximum is equal to ranks in Read/Write and Speak Language.
CharGen.chooseSkillsRules:
Select from the lists below.
At least one Artisan skill and at least two Knowledge skill ranks must be chosen.
CharGen.chooseSpellsRules:
Select spells from the lists below.
Maximum number of spells equals Perception step.
Circle 1 spells cost 1 point, Circle 2 spells cost 2 points.
CharGen.chooseTalentsRules:
Below are the Discipline talents and optional Novice talents.
You may choose one optional talent to raise with the Discipline talents.
Free talents always match Circle rank.
Assigned rank equals starting rank.
CharGen.minimumLanguageSkillPoints: Minimum 1 rank in Read/Write and 2 ranks in Speak Language required. Additional ranks optional.
CharGen.requiredArtisanSkillPoints: At least 1 rank in an Artisan skill is required.
CharGen.requiredKnowledgeSkillPoints: At least 2 ranks in Knowledge skills must be chosen.

ClassAdvancement.classIncreasedTier: The class has been raised to {newTier}
ClassAdvancement.optionalAbilityGained: You gained an optional ability which can be increased later.

LearnSpell.chatFlavorTeacherTest: {name} learns the spell {spell} with the help of the teacher

Rules.attributeIncreaseShortRequirements:
• Only one attribute can be increased at a time.
  • The character must train for {learningTime} days.
  • The character must be rested, with no damage or wounds during training.
  • Attribute training costs money: {trainingCost} silver per day.
  • The character must have enough Legend Points.
  • The character must wait {trainingsTimeAttribute} weeks before training another attribute.
Rules.devotionIncreaseShortRequirements:
• The Questor may only raise one Devotion per day.
  • The new rank may not exceed the Questor Devotion rank.
Rules.disciplineIncreaseShortRequirements:
• Study with an adept of the discipline (Circle 5 or higher).
  • Base silver cost equals the sum of all Circles achieved in other disciplines × 100.
  • Learn all Circle 1 talents not yet known.
  • Sufficient Legend Points must be available to learn all Circle 1 talents at once.
  • The lowest Circle among all disciplines determines the cost for Rank 1 talents of the new discipline.
  • Optional Circle 1 talents can be learned later as usual.
  • Each talent requires 40 hours of training within one week.
Rules.pathIncreaseShortRequirements:
To increase a rank:
  • Pass the corresponding path test.
  • Obtain permission from higher-ranked members of the path.
  • Perform the rank advancement ritual.
Rules.pathLearnShortRequirements:
• The character must have passed the path test.
  • The character must perform the advancement ritual with approval from a higher-ranked member.
  • The character must have sufficient Legend Points for the next rank.
  • The character must succeed at a Thread Weaving test.
Rules.questorClassIncreaseShortRequirements:
• Communicate with the Passion using Questor Devotion.
  • No test required.
  • Only one Devotion may be gained or raised per day, per Devotion.
  • Legend Point cost and time are the only requirements for increasing a Questor Devotion within the same category.
  • Changing to the next category (e.g., from Disciple to Follower) requires completing a quest for the Passion.
  • A Devotion from an earlier category may be chosen.
  • Legend Point cost is determined by when the Devotion becomes available, even if learned later.
Rules.skillIncreaseShortRequirements:
• The character must be rested, with no damage or wounds during training.
  • The character must train for a number of weeks equal to the new skill rank.
  • The character must have sufficient Legend Points for the next rank.
  • Training costs usually 10 silver × the new rank per week.
  • The previous increase must be at least {trainingTime} weeks ago.
Rules.talentIncreaseShortRequirements:
• The adept must be rested, with no damage or wounds.
  • The adept must meditate for eight uninterrupted hours.
  • The talent cannot already have been raised that day.
  • The adept must have sufficient Legend Points for the next rank.

Update.contact: If you have questions or problems, please contact us on the Earthdawn Foundry Discord.
Update.news1_0_0:
Welcome to the latest version of the Earthdawn system for Foundry Virtual Tabletop

This is the first (Beta) release of the reworked Earthdawn system.

The system has been completely reworked from the ground up, and many processes have changed.

Listing all details here would be too much, so please read the Release Notes.
Update.welcome: Welcome to Edition {version} of the Earthdawn Foundry system
